mapper.select: select * from store_view where brand_no = #{brand_no} and (to_number(lat,'999.99999999') between #{minLat} and #{maxLat}) and (to_number(lng,'999.99999999') between #{minLng} and #{maxLng})
select * from store_view where (to_number(lat,'999.99999999') between #{minLat} and #{maxLat}) and (to_number(lng,'999.99999999') between #{minLng} and #{maxLng})

select store_no,store_name,road_address,lat,lng,brand_no,brand_name from( select store_no,store_name,road_address,lat,lng,brand_no,brand_name, DISTNACE_WGS84(#{lat}, #{lng}, to_number(lat,'999.99999999') , to_number(lng,'999.99999999')) as DISTANCE from store_view order by DISTANCE asc) where rownum = 1 and brand_no = #{brand_no}

select store_no,store_name,road_address,lat,lng,brand_no,brand_name from( select store_no,store_name,road_address,lat,lng,brand_no,brand_name, DISTNACE_WGS84(#{lat}, #{lng}, to_number(lat,'999.99999999') , to_number(lng,'999.99999999')) as DISTANCE from store_view order by DISTANCE asc) where rownum = 1
